vote.title: To amend Section 3111.22 of Columbus City Codes to update the name of the Far West Area Commission to the Far West Side Area Commission.
vote.description:
Explanation
 
The Far West Area Commission has requested that Columbus City Code Section 3111.22 be amended to reflect the current complete name of the organization. 
Following the guidance provided by the City Attorney’s Office, the Commission approved a resolution by a vote of 7 to 0 at their August 25, 2020 meeting that specifically requested: “that the City of Columbus create and approve legislation amending the ordinance or otherwise creating new legislation for a new ordinance re-naming the “Far West Area Commission” to “Far West Side Area Commission” as included in the initial petition and bylaws.”
This ordinance will implement the Commission’s request by amending section 3111.22 of the Columbus City Code to add the word “Side” to the name of the Commission.  This change shall ensure the current and complete name of the Commission is properly reflected in Columbus City Code. 
 
FISCAL IMPACT: No funding is requested for this legislation.
Title
 
To amend Section 3111.22 of Columbus City Codes to update the name of the Far West Area Commission to the Far West Side Area Commission. 
Body
 
WHEREAS, the Department of Neighborhoods is responsible for providing assistance to Area Commissions in compliance with Columbus City Code 3109, and 
WHEREAS, the Far West Area Commission has requested that Columbus City Code Section 3111.22 be amended to reflect the current and complete name of the organization, and 
WHEREAS, the Department of Neighborhoods recommends this proposed code change to Columbus City Council for adoption; NOW, THEREFORE,
BE IT ORDAINED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS:
SECTION 1: That section 3111.22 of the Columbus City Codes is amended as follows: 
There is hereby created in the city a commission area to be known as the Far West Side Area Commission, containing approximately 11.65 square miles, 15,605 housing units and located, bounded and described as follows:
On the north:
Columbus Corporation limits from Alton Darby Creek Road to I-270. (Northern boundary meets Hilliard City limits.)
On the east:
I-270 north of Norfolk Southern Railroad until I-70. Continuing north from I-70 along the eastern most track of Buckeye Rail Yard until Scioto Darby Road. (Eastern boundary abuts western boundaries of Greater Hilltop AC and newly formed West Scioto AC.)
On the south:
Centerline of Norfolk Southern Railroad Tracks. (Southern boundary abuts northern edge of Westland AC.)
On the west:
The Hamilton Run north of Norfolk Southern Railroad to Roberts Road. Continuing along the centerline of Roberts Road / Old Roberts Road to a point where, if extended, Old Roberts Road would intersect with Alton Darby Creek Road. Continuing north along the centerline of Alton Darby Creek Road to Columbus corporation limits at a point approximately ¼ mile north of Pinefield Drive. Exclusive of incorporated Hilliard City sections within this area, Anderson Meadows, Hilliard Summit, and two elementary schools.
The Far West Side Area Commission is hereby established as the representative advisory area commission pursuant to Chapter 3109 of the Columbus City Code having the powers and duties thereof in accordance with the regulations therein and the by-laws for the Far West Side Area Commission filed with the City Clerk, subsequently amended and now approved hereby.
 
SECTION 2:  That current section 3111.22 of the Columbus City Codes is hereby repealed.
 
SECTION 3: That this ordinance shall take effect and be in force from and after the earliest period allowed by law.
